item.title: Save the date: 28.06.2020 16:00 - HNAP-Talk at SDRA 2020
item.description:
Lukas will give the talk “HNAP for Pluto-SDR - Implementing the HAMNET Access Protocol on the Adalm Pluto SDR” at the Software Defined Radio Academy which will be held “online” in 2020: https://2020.sdra.io/pages/programme.html.
There will be a live chat channel availble to receive comments and questions. Feel free to get in touch.
